content: go-to watch cap by kent turman description designed to grab and go this watch cap features a warm double layered brim and an aesthetically pleasing stockinette stitch crown perfect for those that appreciate a tidy no-fuss hat on their way out the door size medium a snug fit on an adult with a 21in/53cm circumference head finished measurements approximately 17in/43cm circumference & 8in/20cm from brim to peak gauge 18 sts = 4in/10cm in stockinette stitch on larger size 7 needle materials  1 skein of madelinetosh tosh vintage  2 size 1 us/2 25 mm 24 circular needles or a similar fine gauge needle for sealing the brim  size 6 us/4 0 mm 24 circular needle  size 7 us/4 5 mm 24 circular needle  size 7 us/4 5 mm double pointed needles set of 5 for crown decreases  stitch marker  tapestry needle abbreviations  k = knit  p = purl  rs = right side of work  ws = wrong side of work  ssk = slip slip knit slipped stitches together  k2tog = knit 2 stitches together  st s = stitch es  st st = stockinette stitch  circ s = circular needle s  dpn s = double pointed needle s  round s = round s © 2016 kent turman all rights reserved page|1 go-to watch cap by kent turman directions cast on & brim  with size 6 circs provisionally cast on 96 sts in the round  place st marker to indicate the beginning of round  work 1x1 ribbing * k 1 p 1 *repeat until the brim measures 7 in length and you ve reached the st marker seal brim  transfer the working sts from the size 6 circs to one of the fine gauge circs  transfer the live provisionally cast on sts onto the other 24 fine gauge circ  fold the ribbed cuff in the direction of the arrow so that the provisionally cast on sts on the bottom will now be on the top rs of the work © 2016 kent turman all rights reserved page|2 go-to watch cap by kent turman  hold circs with the live sts parallel and begin knitting both layers together with the size 6 circs © 2016 kent turman all rights reserved page|3 go-to watch cap by kent turman  after all 96 sts of the brim have been sealed with the knit st place a st marker to indicate the beginning of round note if there is a yarn tail from the provisional cast on you can tuck it into the cuff with the tapestry needle later body  decrease round * k 4 k2tog *repeat until the end of round 80 sts remain  switch to size 7 24 circs  work st st for 2 crown  divide sts evenly onto four size 7 dpns  decrease round * k to center 4 sts ssk k2tog k to end
